Summary: Movement of shock UAVs: 1. BpLA in Chernihiv Oblast, north-west course. 2. Several groups of BpLA in Shostkinsky district of Sumy region, course to the south. 3. BpLA from Poltava region to Cherkasy region and Kharkiv region. 4. Several groups of BpLA from Kharkiv region towards Poltava. 5. BpLA in the Mykolayiv region in the Voznesensky district, stay in shelters.
